actions.name: Brazen Ashes

cost.trigger: The user would be Fainted by a damaging attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user would be Fainted by a damaging attack.
Effect: The user does not Faint and heals 100% HP. Then, the user gains Boosted 7. This can occur once per combat.

system.description:

Effect: The user does not Faint and heals 100% HP. Then, the user gains Boosted 7. This can occur once per combat.
